General.Name: Generalplus Technology Inc
General.Description: Generalplus Technology Inc. researches, develops, and sells integrated circuits worldwide. It offers speech/tone synthesizers, sound processors, controllers, and one battery speech synthesizers; LCD controllers and drivers; multimedia processors; automobile video recorders; remote, motor, gTouch, and charger controls, as well as controllers for home applications; flash products; and motor drivers, audio amplifiers, linear regulators, ADC and microphone pre-amplifiers, I/O bus extenders, USB bridge and socket servers, touch applications, USB headset solutions, and three-axis accelerometers. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan. Generalplus Technology Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Sunplus Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Address: Hsinchu Science Park, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30077
